description:
With confidence, we can achieve anything, without it, we are lost.

That's why it is so important to spend time working on becoming more confident. Confidence is like a muscle, the more you use it, the more it grows.


Has low self confidence and low self esteem been holding you back in your life?


Is it holding you back from putting yourself out there and finding love?

Are you tired of worrying what other people are thinking of you all the time?

Is it holding you back in your career and from going for the job you always wanted?

Or perhaps you want to start your own business but you cant seem to develop the confidence needed to take the first step?

Are you uncomfortable with public speaking or talking in groups?

Are you tired of being overly critical with yourself and over analyzing every action you take?

Or maybe you just feel uncomfortable in your own skin, like I did for many years...

If you were like me, you are probably tired of people telling you the answer to all your problems is to "Just be more confident."

If only it were that simple…


Perhaps you have tried a few times to be more confident and for whatever reason it didn't work, now you have given up.

Well, I'm here to reignite the fire within you and tell you it is possible for you.


But this time, instead of doing it all by yourself, we are going to do it together.


The good news is, anyone can learn confidence, and it doesn't matter where you're starting from.


Confidence is not some exclusive club you are born into, anyone can join.

Hi I'm Tobi Atkins. I am a personal transformation coach, author, online entrepreneur and ex-professional athlete.

I travel the world full time, run multiple online business and live a life of adventure, passion and fun. My self-improvement articles have been featured on lifehacker. com, lifehack. com and pick the brain.

If there was one trait that has been critical in helping me to get to where I am today, it would be confidence.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

So why am I qualified to give advice on confidence an self esteem?

I have been studying human psychology for 7 years, both on a university level for 3 years, and in the 4 years since then I have been studying under some of the worlds leading dating and lifestyle coaches.

These are some of the most confident people in the world and I have had the amazing opportunity to live and work with these guys over the past few years. These are people who go for what they want in life, who risk it all to live their dreams.

I have taken everything I have ever learnt about confidence from these guys and boiled down the process into small actionable steps that you can learn!

I have taught this skill (and I emphasize the word skill because anyone can learn it) to dozens of people from all walks of life and professions, in private one-on-one coaching. Now I have made this information accessible to everyone for the first time.

But more importantly than that all of that...

I'm qualified to give advice on confidence and self esteem because I've lived years of my life with low confidence.

I grew up with extremely low self esteem and low confidence. I was actually clinically diagnosed with social anxiety and was on antidepressants medication for most of my teens and early twenties.

When I was growing up, social situations were extremely awkward for me.

I would feel uncomfortable around new people and that would cause them to feel uncomfortable around me.

I found myself stuck in a low paying jobs I hated but I didn't believe I could do any better.

I was too shy to ask girls on dates so I spent most of my life alone.

I was afraid of being judged, afraid of confrontation, and constantly worried what everyone was thinking of me, all the time.

Having low confidence held me back in just about every way you can imagine.The worst thing of all though was the feeling of being uncomfortable in my own skin.

If this sounds familiar to you, I know exactly what you are going through and I'm here to tell with 100% certainty it doesn't have to be like that for you.

But don't think it gets better with age or on its own, it doesn't. In fact oftentimes it gets worse as you get older.

I have put the work in, years of work to become the person I am today, and I am still working on myself everyday.

Now when people meet me they actually don't believe me when I tell them about the person I used to be. That is a massive compliment to me.

That's why I created this program. To help people as many people as I can move from low self-esteem and low confidence into greatness and live their dreams.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
In this program you will learn...

  • Exactly what it takes to build rock solid confidence
  • To be more assertive and get what you want, without coming off as weak or arrogant
  • To get people to pay attention to you, respect you and take you seriously
  • To exude confidence in everything you do
  • To like yourself more and grow your self esteem
  • To identify the common causes of low self-esteem and confidence and avoid them
  • To become your own best friend and personal life coach
  • To get out of your comfort zone and go after what you want
  • To turn that negative inner voice into a positive one

and much more.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I believe I have created something truly life changing here. Something that has the potential to totally trasnform your life.

Whether you want just a little more confidence and to like your self better, or if you are suffering from social anxiety and depression as I was for many years. You will greatly benefit from the lessons and action steps provide here.

Confidence is the key to success in our lives and I am going to show you how to get it.

I am always weary of taking advice from people who haven't been in the situation they are trying to help you with, and you should be too.

If you haven't been there and lived through it you can't really understand what it feels like to have low self-esteem and confidence.

I found people who hadn't been through it couldn't really relate to my struggles. I got the most help on my journey from people who have been through the same situation as me and come out the other side.

And that's why I am now paying it forward.

I have been there. I know first hand the problems you face and I can relate to them because I have faced them too. I started from the bottom and I have made the journey out of it.

I have built my confidence and self-esteem from the ground up and I am going to show you the exact steps I took, and how you can do the same.

And in probably in less time than you think.

Confidence is a learned skill and anyone can learn it. It doesn't matter where you are in your life now or what you have been told.

Confidence comes from having a high self-esteem and I am going to show you the most effective ways of building a healthy self-esteem.

And once you learn this you will then be able to get on with your life and go out and do the things that you want.

  • You will finally be able to have the romantic relationships you want, take on more of a management role at work and earn more money.
  • Finally start that business or career change you have been putting off.
  • You will be able to go for anything you want in your life without fear holding you back.
  • No more feeling nervous, shy and inhibited.
  • You're going to learn how to let go all of that and become comfortable in your own skin and proud of who you are.

I want you to imagine right now how good it would feel to walk through the world with confidence and without fear.

How does it feel to be the person you always wanted to be?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

But is this really going to work for me?

Right now you may doubting that this is going to work for you and that's ok, that's normal. But there is a part inside of you that knows you need to make a change.

I know this training will work for you because I have used it on myself and I have taught it to dozens of my one-on-one clients who have seen amazing life changing results.

I am going to give you techniques you can use to improve your confidence starting today.

I've attended just about every confidence seminar out there. From Tony Robbins, to Brian Tracy, to life and dating coaches. I've read every book.

I've been to see life coaches and psychologists and psychiatrists.

I have taken everything I have ever learnt about confidence and self-esteem building and synthesized it down into what works and left out what doesn't.

In this course we are going to dive deep into your psychology and locate the causes of your lack of confidence.

What I have found is once you sort the causes out, then the effects take care of themselves without you really having to think about it. This is a much easier and better way to go about it in my experience.

That being said I am still going to give you some killer confidence boosting exercises you can use to come across as a more confident person.

Together with addressing the mental causes, this will help to supercharge your confidence.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
In the course, you are going to learn how to to like yourself more, go after the things you want in your life, attract your ideal partner and move to the next level financially.


I am absolutely certain that if you take the course and do the exercises provided, you are going to see a dramatic and lasting rise in your confidence and self esteem levels.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don't just take my word for it, here is what others are saying about the course..


Wow! Powerful stuff...

First of all, I loved the beach and lakes in the background shots.

The instructor Tobi highlighted many issues I am currently dealing with and even made me become aware of some harmful things I didn't even know I was doing! I also loved how he related the concepts to his own life and experiences and how he dealt with them.

The material covered is powerful and uplifting, I feel so inspired after watching this. I can't remember when I have ever felt so felt this good and confident about myself.

Life = Bring it on!

by Katie Ashton


Great Course

Tobi really helped me in this course to reshape my beliefs and my whole thinking towards a more positive outlook on things. I know I still have a long way to go to reach my goal, but thanks to this course I now have the right tools to do so. I can only recommend this course to anyone who wants to brush up his/hers self-esteem muscle.

by Julian J

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If low confidence is something that is holding you back, you need to take action today.


If not now then when?

If you don't take action and do something about it today, nothing is going to change.

Trust me when I say, regret weighs tonnes. I lived 20 years of my life full of regrets, you don't want to get to the end of your life with regrets.

So ask yourself this question…

If I don't take action now where will I be 12 months from now? And how about 5 or 10, 20 years from now?

If you keep taking the same actions as you are today how is anything going to change?

Life is short, I urge you to take action towards your happiness today. What have you got to loose?

I have poured my heart and soul into making this course. It has worked for me, worked for many others and I know it will work for you too.

I look forward to seeing you on the inside.
title: Overcome Social Anxiety. Build Confidence & Self-Esteem
